name: Puzzles & Dragons Gold
overview: Puzzle & Dragons Gold is a Japanese puzzle action game by GungHo Entertainment. It was released for Nintendo Switch on January 15, 2020, featuring the classic game elements from the original mobile game and its story mode following the anime adaptation. Using the traditional puzzle actions from the mobile game, Puzzle & Dragons GOLD is a competitive game where you line up three or more Orb combos of the same color and your monsters will attack your opponent's team. Use your monster's skills to boost your attacks and defensive strength! Form your own unique team and defeat your rivals!
